attributes.action: Withdraw the Ambassador from Sudan and dismiss the Sudanese ambassador
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The disgraceful treatment of the schoolteacher Gillian Gibbons warrants an immediate and significant action by HM Government.  The BBC today reports that crowds marched after Friday prayers demanding her death. A message must go forth that religious intolerance of this kind is utterly unacceptable.
